<letter id="smd7953">
<recipient first="" last="" type="individual"/>
</p><p>
[ <a href='/results.php?city=new orleans' rel='city origin'>New Orleans</a> ], <a rel="month origin" value="6">June</a> <a rel='day origin' value='17'>17th</a>. [<a href='/results.php?year=1863' rel="origin">1863</a>]
</p><p>
I must write something somewhere, I don't care if dinner is ready, and Brother's "safe old Secesh" downstairs ! Lydia has another boy ! Letter has just 
come, and I am demented about my new godchild ! There now! feel better! One more word it shall be called "Howell." 
Dear, blessed little baby ! how I shall love it ! 
</p><p>
</letter>
